Class: Tooltip

insight. Tooltip

new insight.Tooltip()

A tooltip, displaying values for a series or point when hovered over.

Methods

#this.offset(){object}

The distance to which move the tooltip for this series relative to its default point.
Returns:
The {x,y} offset to place the tooltip from the point.

#this.offset(offset){this}

Sets the distance to which move the tooltip for this series relative to its default point.
Name Type Description
offset object The new distance to which move the tooltip for this series relative to its default point.

#this.styles(){object}

The current style for the tooltip.
Returns:
The style of the tooltip, in standard {'name': 'value', ...} format of CSS values.

#this.styles(style){this}

Sets the current style for the tooltip.
Name Type Description
style object The new style of the tooltip, in standard {'name': 'value', ...} format of CSS values.
